marker.ph: /// A class collection for rendering a label with nice features. ...
/// Enum of BorderTypes used for the Labels BorderStyle. ...
/// Set the border type to none. ...
/// Set the border type to squared. ...
/// Set the border type to rounded. ...
/// Enum of layout styles used for the Labels TextPaternImage. ...
/// Set the pattern layout to normal. ...
/// Set the pattern layout to center. ...
/// Set the pattern layout to stretch. ...
/// Set the pattern layout to title. ...
/// Enum of areas used for the Labels ShadowPosition. ...
/// Set the Shadow area to Top Left. ...
/// Set the Shadow area to Top Right. ...
/// Set the Shadow area to Bottom Left. ...
/// Set the Shadow area to Bottom Right. ...
/// Enum of drawing types used for the Labels ShadowStyle. ...
/// Set the shadow drawing type to <c>DrawShadow</c>. ...
/// Set the shadow drawing type to <c>FillShadow</c>. ...
/// Gets or sets the rotation angle. ...
/// Gets or sets the text orientation. ...
/// Gets or sets the text direction. ...
/// Gets or sets the type of the graphic. ...
/// Gets or sets the background color for the control. ...
/// Gets or sets the foreground color of the control. ...
/// Gets or sets the fore color transparency. ...
/// Gets or sets the Text alignment. ...
/// Gets or sets the image alignment. ...
/// Gets or sets the outline color of the Text. ...
/// Gets or sets the outline thickness. ...
/// Gets or sets the color of the border. ...
/* Set it back to the prior color ... */
/// Gets or sets the border style. ...
/// Gets or sets the Text pattern image. ...
/// Gets or sets the Text pattern image layout. ...
/// Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show Text shadow. ...
/// Gets or sets the color of the shadow. ...
/* Set it back to the prior color ... */
/// Gets or sets the shadow position. ...
/// Gets or sets the shadow depth. ...
/// Gets or sets the shadow transparency. ...
/// Gets or sets the shadow style. ...
Add it to OnPaint / Graphics Rendering component
/// Gets or sets the Text rendering. ...
/// A class collection for rendering a label with nice features. ...
/* If the ShowTextShadow property is set to true then draw the shadow ... */
/* Now use the Graphics.TranslateTransform to shift the _with1 back in the opposite ... */
Cut and Paste it on top of the component class

Properties that are targets of DesignerActionPropertyItem entries.

/// Gets or sets the color of the fore. ...
/// Gets or sets a value indicating whether [show text shadow]. ...
/// Gets or sets the text pattern image. ...
/// Gets or sets the color of the outline. ...
/// Gets or sets the color of the border. ...
/// Gets or sets the color of the shadow. ...
/// Gets or sets the border style. ...
/// Gets or sets the text align. ...
/// Gets or sets the image align. ...
/// Gets or sets the text pattern image layout. ...
/// Gets or sets the shadow position. ...
/// Gets or sets the shadow style. ...
/// Gets or sets the fore color transparency. ...
/// Gets or sets the outline thickness. ...
/// Gets or sets the shadow depth. ...
/// Gets or sets the shadow transparency. ...
/// Gets or sets the width of the correct. ...
/// Gets or sets the sliding limit. ...
/// Gets or sets a value indicating whether this <see cref="UltraLabelSmartTagActionList"/> is slide. ...
/// Gets or sets the sliding speed. ...
/// Returns the collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem" /> objects contained ...
/// A class collection for rendering a placeholder text. ...
/// Gets or sets the text alignment. ...
/// Gets or sets the maximum length. ...
/// Gets or sets a value indicating whether this <see cref="ZeroitUltraTextBox"/> is multiline. ...
/// Gets or sets a value indicating whether [use system password character]. ...
/// Gets or sets a value indicating whether [read only]. ...
/// Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance is enabled. ...
/// Gets or sets the color of the focused. ...
/// Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control can respond to user interaction. ...
/// Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the control. ...
/// Gets or sets the foreground color of the control. ...
/// Gets or sets the color of the place holder text. ...
/// Gets or sets the color of the text background. ...
/// Gets or sets the password character. ...
/// Gets or sets a value indicating whether [word wrap]. ...
/// Gets or sets the color of the enabled un focused. ...
/// Gets or sets the color of the disabled un focused. ...
/// Gets or sets the color of the disabled string. ...
/// Gets or sets a value indicating whether this <see cref="ZeroitUltraTextBox"/> is placeholder. ...
/// Gets or sets the place holder text. ...
/// Handles the MouseEnter event of the PlaceHolderLabel control. ...
/// Handles the Click event of the PlaceHolderLabel control. ...
/// Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="ZeroitUltraTextBox" /> class. ...
/// Handles the TextChanged event of the UltraTB control. ...

/// Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="ZeroitVerticalLabel" /> class. ...
/// OnPaint override. This is where the text is rendered vertically. ...
/// Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created. ...
/// Handles the Resize event of the VerticalTextBox control. ...
/// Graphics rendering mode. Support for antialiasing. ...
/// The text to be displayed in the control ...
/// Whether the text will be drawn from Bottom or from Top. ...
/// Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable/disable transparent background. ...
/// Text is drawn from bottom - up ...
/// Text is drawn from top to bottom ...
/// A class collection for rendering vertical string. ...
/// Gets or sets the text to use. ...
/// Gets or sets the text spread. ...
/// Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="ZeroitVerticalString" /> class. ...
/* Create a small rectangle for each individual character. ... */
/* Loop through each character in the string, draw it in the charRect rectangle, ... */
/* Does our character appear in the "post" list? ... */
Add it to OnPaint / Graphics Rendering component
